Free shipping BMWT.  Prefer paypal FF, just add 3% for G&S.  Can accept venmo as well.  PM for payment details.  Open to offers.  Lots of other t206, just too lazy to scan.  These are my more "unique" cards - rest are run of the mill A-2 HoFers or SLers or commons.  Let me know if looking for something.
